FuncDef: This command enables the use of the pool indicated by DHCP client. When enabled, the IP address pool to be used by this server is the pool is indicated by the vendor-specific sub-option 13 of the DHCP option 82. When disabled or if there is no sub-option 13 in the DHCP message, the pool selection falls back to theuse-gi-addressconfiguration.

ParaDef.Info: A single ASCII character specifies the delimiter of separating primary and secondary pool names in Option82 VSO.
